main event: A 12-year-old boy witnessed a flying saucer at night in Collinsville, Illinois, describing rapid movement and unusual lights.
interesting points: The object was observed to have greenish-white color with purple lights,The object made a 90 degree turn and flew north after descending rapidly,It traveled faster than any jet aircraft,The sighting lasted for about 2 seconds,The document suggests possible explanations include a meteor or aircraft but notes insufficient data for a valid conclusion.
witness description: A 12-year-old boy who reported the sighting as truthful and dependable.
